sys_properties.description: Specifies if the instance checks the condition statement of async business rules (the When field is set to async) prior to running the business rule. If this property is set to true, the instance evaluates the async business rule conditions a second time before running the rule. If this property is set to false or missing, the instance does not evaluate the conditions a second time.
